item.title: GoLogger - Module to Log with formatting in Golang
item.description: GoLogger is a logger module for golang based on logrus module. This module was created to reduce the logrus abstraction in order to use just 2 functions: Init() : initialize the logrus params Print(): Print an error with the base fields Usage: Import package import ( "github.com/alknopfler/Gologger/gologger" ) Init with stdout and info level: gologger.Init(os.Stdout, logrus.InfoLevel) Print to show the error message: gologger.Print("WARN",7,"Description to show","filename.go")
